mapper.select: select a.accountId, a.accountNm, ap.managerYn, ap.teamNo from account as a inner join appoint as ap on a.AccountId=ap.AccountId where a.accountId=#{accountId} and a.password=#{password}
SELECT CASE WHEN (count(*) > 0) THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS role FROM feeadmin where adminId=#{accountId}
